concept-wr.title: Disk Hardware Configuration for System Storage

conbody.p: CGTS-3888 Add letters to equations, move backup to lastFor the controller node, a minimum 500 GB solid-state drive (SSD) is mandatory for capacity and performance. However, a bottom-up calculation of the disk size requirement should be used to ensure 500 GB is sufficient.

sl.sli: Total Primary Disk requirement = 39 GB (fixed platform) + D GB (database) + X GB (images) + Y GB (Image Conversion) + B GB (backup)
X = Images (see Glance Backend Dimensioning section)
